channel.title: Adding donor and moving player rights
channel.description:
Hey i've looked all round for tut's but can't fine any...
I am trying to make a donor rank/status but need to move server owner to player rights 4, admins to 3 and mods to 2 so my donor rights would be 1.
how would i come across doing this?
thanks.
also i know how to change crowns but how could i add a crown for player rights 4 etc?
